title: Average price of wearable technology products in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2014
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Wearable Technology Products, and Average price in GBP in each Wearable Technology Products on the y axis.
The Average price in GBP is highest at Wearable Technology Products Action cameras headsets and glasses and lowest at Wearable Technology Products Health and fitness trackers.
The difference of Average price in GBP between the highest and lowest Wearable Technology Products is 147.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average price in GBP for 5 number of Wearable Technology Productss.
The Average price in GBP is appeared to be the highest at Wearable Technology Products Action cameras headsets and glasses and lowest at Wearable Technology Products Health and fitness trackers.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Wearable Technology Products, and Average price in GBP in each Wearable Technology Products on the y axis.
The Average price in GBP is highest at Wearable Technology Products Action cameras headsets and glasses and lowest at Wearable Technology Products Health and fitness trackers.
The difference of Average price in GBP between the highest and lowest Wearable Technology Products is 147.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average price in GBP for 5 number of Wearable Technology Productss.
Wearable Technology Products Action cameras headsets and glasses has the highest Average price in GBP and Health and fitness trackers has the lowest Average price in GBP.
The highest Wearable Technology Products Action cameras headsets and glasses has 147.0 more Average price in GBP than the lowest Wearable Technology Products Health and fitness trackers.
Average price in GBP at Wearable Technology Products Action cameras headsets and glasses is 220.0 , second place is Smart watches at 163.0, and thirdly is Total market at 120.0.
The Wearable Technology Products Health and fitness trackers tends to be 1.67 percent lower than average.
The Average price in GBP is 658.0 if we add up values of all Wearable Technology Productss.
